content: {"name": "SCARC-Harvest Home Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "", "email": "", "url": "https://www.scarc.org/contact-us/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4 Camre Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Newton", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07860", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 41.0961029, "longitude": -74.7360386}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 383-7442", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}]}
